comment: I'm interested in the Moto X Play or Style . Will there be monthly seccurity updates for these devices ?
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / interest-01
            :ARG1 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG2 (o / or
                  :op1 (p / product
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Moto"
                              :op2 "X"
                              :op3 "Play"))
                  :op2 (p2 / product
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Styles"))))
      :snt2 (u / update-02
            :ARG1 (s / seccurity)
            :beneficiary (d / device
                  :mod (t / this))
            :frequency (r / rate-entity-91
                  :ARG3 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 1
                        :unit (m2 / month)))
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown)))
